attributes.action: London Bridge Station Disruption: Stop Fare Increases / Use Tickets on Any Underground Route
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition if you agree that customers who will be impacted by the severe disruption at London Bridge, should not be subject to fare increases in 2015.

Please also sign if you agree that customers who cannot alight at London Bridge due to the disruption, should be able to use their ticket on other TfL services (Underground / Buses) to get to their end destination.
